modName: Iman - Female Redguard Preset for RaceMenu
summary: Preset of my character Iman for RaceMenu
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][size=5][size=3]_________________[/size][/size]

I thoroughly dislike it when videogames, movies, or whatever is shown as public entertainment doesn't find a way to make a woman look badass or be a character people want to identify to without oversexualizing (now that's a word whose existence I'm doubting but you get the idea) the crap out of her. Well I think Bethesda did a decent job with Aela, for example. Except for the "Yo, let's still show some bewbs" part, that is. Or with the default FemShep in Mass Effect. Yeah, she was cool.
So here is my attempt at a redguard female warrior. I hope you'll like Iman. If you don't, well...
She'll be coming for ya.[/size]
[size=5]
REQUIREMENTS[/size]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?][size=3]The Eyes of Beauty[/size][/url][size=3]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68355/?]RAWR Paint[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?][size=3]Northborn Scars[/size][/url]
[/size][size=5]
OPTIONAL[size=3]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356/?]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]
[size=5][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive Lips HD[/url][/size][/size]

[size=5]INSTALLATION
[size=3]
[/size][/size]Place the file in your Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets directory.
This directory is automatically created when installing RaceMenu.
In game, open the console, type in "showracemenu" (without the quoting marks), hit enter. Close the console.
Go to the Presets slide, press F9, click on the Iman preset.

[size=5]PERMISSIONS

[size=3]Do not use or reupload without me granting you permission to do so. Just ask and I likely will, anyway.
If given permission to use or reupload, keep in mind that I want this mod,
and any mod I might do in the future, to be Nexus exclusive. Means no
uploads on any other sites than the Nexus, and no uploads on Steam
Workshop.
If given permission to use or reupload, thank you for crediting me, as well as the people I credited.

[size=5]CREDITS[/size][/size][/size]

Bethesda Softworks for creating Skyrim and giving us all the possibility to mod it with the Creation Kit
The Nexus sites for hosting our mods and providing us the Nexus Mod Manager
The SKSE team
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481/?]Expired6798[/url] for RaceMenu
[size=5][size=3][url=http://www.girlplaysgame.com]Girlplaysgame[/url] for RAWR Paint[/size][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027/?]Hvergelmir[/url] for Brows
[size=5][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3394799/?]Northborn[/url] for Northborn Scars[/size][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756/?]Gabriel Mailhot[/url] for The Eyes of Beauty
[size=5][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3676578/?]EcthelionOtW[/url] for Seductive Lips HD[/size][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/726673/?]Xenius[/url] for XCE - Xenius Characer Enhancement

_________________[/size][/size]
[/center]
author: Saronis
